# Vanduo Framework v1.1.8 — LLM Context

You are an expert Vanduo Framework developer. Vanduo is a **pure HTML/CSS/JS framework** for consumers (no build required to use it) with **zero runtime dependencies** and a **Fibonacci / Golden Ratio design system**. v1.1.8 introduced the **Draggable component**. The repository itself uses a minimal build pipeline (esbuild + lightningcss) to produce the `dist/` outputs.

---

## Core Principles
- **No build tools for consumers**: include CSS in `<head>`, JS at end of `<body>`.
- **Naming safety**: all framework classes are prefixed with `vd-`.
- **Design system**: spacing, type, and layout follow Fibonacci / Golden Ratio.
- **Themeable**: runtime theme customizer + data attributes on `<html>`.

---

## Defaults (v1.1.x)
Set by Theme Customizer when no user preference exists:
- Primary color: `blue`
- Neutral color: `zinc`
- Border radius: `0.5`
- Font family: `open-sans`
- Theme: `system` (follows OS)

---

## Quick Start (Local)
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" data-theme="system">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8" />
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/vanduo.css" />
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/icons/icons.css" />
  <title>Vanduo Page</title>
</head>
<body>
  <nav class="vd-navbar vd-navbar-fixed">
    <div class="vd-navbar-container">
      <a class="vd-navbar-brand" href="#"><i class="ph-fill ph-drop"></i> Vanduo</a>
    </div>
  </nav>

  <main class="vd-container vd-py-8">
    <h1>Hello Vanduo</h1>
    <button class="vd-btn vd-btn-primary">Action</button>
  </main>

  <script src="js/vanduo.js"></script>
  <script>Vanduo.init();</script>
</body>
</html>
```

## Naming Conventions
- **All classes**: `vd-` prefix
- Examples:
  - `vd-container`, `vd-row`, `vd-col-6`
  - `vd-btn`, `vd-btn-primary`
  - `vd-card`, `vd-card-glow`
  - `vd-input`, `vd-form-group`

---

## Theming (Runtime)
Theme Customizer writes attributes to `<html>`:
- `data-theme="light|dark|system"`
- `data-primary="blue|cyan|indigo|..."`
- `data-neutral="zinc|gray|slate|..."`
- `data-radius="0|0.125|0.25|0.375|0.5"`
- `data-font="open-sans|ubuntu|rubik|..."`

These values persist via `localStorage`.

---

## Layout & Grid
### 12-Column Grid
```html
<div class="vd-container">
  <div class="vd-row">
    <div class="vd-col-12 vd-col-md-6">A</div>
    <div class="vd-col-12 vd-col-md-6">B</div>
  </div>
</div>
```

### Fibonacci / Golden Ratio
- **Row-based**: `vd-row-fib-3`, `vd-row-fib-4`, `vd-row-golden`
- **Grid-based**: `vd-grid-fib-3`, `vd-grid-fib-4`, `vd-grid-golden`
- **Toggle mode** (JS): add `data-layout-mode="standard"` and use `[data-grid-toggle]`

---

## Utilities (Examples)
- **Spacing**: `vd-m-5`, `vd-p-8`, `vd-gap-5`, `vd-gap-fib-13`
- **Text**: `vd-text-primary`, `vd-text-muted`, `vd-text-sm`
- **BG**: `vd-bg-primary`, `vd-bg-success`, `vd-bg-dark`
- **Borders**: `vd-border`, `vd-border-primary`, `vd-rounded-md`
- **Shadows/Glow**: `vd-shadow-lg`, `vd-hover-glow`

## Components (Common)
- Buttons, Cards, Forms, Navbars
- Tabs, Accordions, Modals, Dropdowns
- Alerts, Badges, Chips, Toasts
- Pagination, Breadcrumbs, Collections
- Tables, Avatars, Skeletons
- Preloader / Progress
- Theme Customizer, Image Box, Doc Search
- **Draggable (v1.1.8+)**: `.vd-draggable`, `.vd-draggable-container`, `.vd-drop-zone`

---

## JavaScript API
```js
Vanduo.init();             // required in v1.1.x
Vanduo.reinit('dropdown'); // reinitialize a component
Vanduo.destroyAll();       // cleanup all components

Vanduo.components.toast.show({
  title: 'Success',
  message: 'Saved.',
  type: 'success',
  duration: 3000
});
```

---

## Data Attributes (Common)
- `data-modal="#id"` / `data-dismiss="modal"`
- `data-tooltip="text"` / `data-tooltip-placement="top|right|bottom|left"`
- `data-toggle="theme"` / `data-toggle="font"`
- `data-collapsible`
- `data-grid-toggle="#selector"`
- `data-theme-customizer-trigger`
- `data-draggable="value"` (used with `.vd-draggable`)

---

## Draggable API (v1.1.8+)
- **Classes**: `.vd-draggable` (single item), `.vd-draggable-handle` (grab point), `.vd-draggable-container` (auto-sorting grid list), `.vd-draggable-container-vertical` (auto-sorting vertical list), `.vd-drop-zone`
- **Events**: `draggable:start`, `draggable:drag`, `draggable:end`, `draggable:drop`, `draggable:reorder`
- **JS Control**: `Vanduo.components.draggable.makeDraggable(element, { data: 'value' })`

---

## Key Files
- `css/vanduo.css` — master stylesheet
- `js/vanduo.js` — global JS entry (manual init)
- `css/core/` — tokens, colors, typography, grid
- `css/components/` — buttons, cards, forms, etc
- `css/utilities/` — shadows, tables, transitions, transforms
- `dist/` — production-ready minified build

## Testing and Tooling

- Tests use **Playwright Test** only (`@playwright/test`).
- Main scripts (from package.json):
  - `pnpm test` – full Playwright suite
  - `pnpm test:a11y` – accessibility-focused tests (`@a11y` tag)
  - `pnpm test:mobile`, `pnpm test:desktop` – viewport-specific runs
  - `pnpm test:chromium`, `pnpm test:firefox`, `pnpm test:webkit` – engine-specific runs
- Configuration:
  - `playwright.config.ts` defines desktop, mobile, and tablet projects.
  - Local server uses Python’s `http.server` to serve the repo at `http://localhost:8787`.

Linting and build:
- `pnpm lint` – runs Stylelint for CSS and ESLint for JS.
- `pnpm build` – runs the minimal build pipeline to generate `dist/`.
